 UIMA Tools and Servers

UIMA comes with various tools and a simple server (which runs an arbitrary UIMA pipeline as a Web Services). Some of these are provided with the main SDK downloads, others with the UIMA Addons package.

Tools

  • Component Descriptor Editor
  • Collection Processing Engine descriptor editor and runner
  • Document Analyzer - runs a pipeline on directory of files, shows results
  • GUI to view XML exported versions of CASes
  • CAS Visual Debugger
  • CAS Editor
  • Generate JCas Java classes for a type system
  • PEAR Packaging ANT Task
  • PEAR Packaging Maven Plugin (moved to main Java SDK)
  • PEAR installer

Miscellaneous

  • Feature Structure Variables
  • Simple Server (UIMA REST service)
